document_data.name: Sunsplash
document_data.mainbody: '''Sunsplash''' was one of the more notable dishes from the city of [[Velen]] in the nation of [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Description: A salad dish of feathery [[sharpcheese]] that was served on a bed of [[charthoor lettuce]] leaves. The greens were tossed with a dressing of [[vinegar]] and [[mushroom]]-[[fern]] [[gravy]].
document_data.History: As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Sunsplash could be found on [[Blackthorn's Brew]]'s menu, a [[festhall]] on the [[Captain's Cliff]] in Velen. The dish was mentioned among other notable foods included in [[Volothamp Geddarm]]'s published guide to [[Amn]] and Tethyr.
